;;;61     				}
;;;62     			break;

;;;74     				}
;;;75     			break;

;;;79     				outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_LEFT_TURN_135;

;;;81     			break;
;;;82     			}
;;;83     			case 7:{
;;;84     				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;

;;;87     			break;
;;;88     			}

;;;90     				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(RIGHT);
;;;91     				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;92     				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;93     					outfireRobotState.workStep = 99; 
;;;94     				}
;;;95     			break;
;;;96     			}
;;;97     			case 99:{
;;;98     				if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[FIRST_FIRE] == 1){
;;;99     					outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = RETURN;
;;;100    				}else{
;;;101    					outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = NINTH_FIRE;
;;;102    				}
;;;103    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;104    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;105    				break;
;;;106    			}
;;;107    		}
;;;108    	}

;;;112    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(RIGHT);

;;;115    				}
;;;116    			break;

                          AREA ||i.app_findNinthFire||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  app_findNinthFire PROC
;;;160    /***************九火点基本完善***************/
;;;161    void app_findNinthFire(void){  																			 //从一号判断有无火焰之后纠正车体姿态，（不管有没有）都从一号火点位置作为本函数的起点
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;162    	if(outfireRobotState.fireArray[NINTH_FIRE] == 1){										//有火
000004  4c8a              LDR      r4,|L2.560|
000006  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
000008  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000a  7ca7              LDRB     r7,[r4,#0x12]  ; outfireRobotState
00000c  2501              MOVS     r5,#1
;;;163    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){
00000e  2102              MOVS     r1,#2
;;;164    			case 0:{
;;;165    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;166    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;
;;;167    				break;
;;;168    			}
;;;169    			case 1:{
;;;170    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 2;
;;;171    			break;
;;;172    			}
;;;173    			case 2:{
;;;174    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;175    				if(SRF_04_Data3.getDistance < 25 && SRF_04_Data4.getDistance < 25){
000010  f8dfb220          LDR      r11,|L2.564|
;;;176    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;177    				}
;;;178    			break;
;;;179    			}
;;;180    			case 3:{
;;;181    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;182    				if(SRF_04_Data3.getDistance > 50 && SRF_04_Data4.getDistance <30){
;;;183    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 4;	
;;;184    				}
;;;185    			break;
;;;186    			}
;;;187    			case 4:{
;;;188    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_LEFT_135;
;;;189    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 5;	
;;;190    			break;
;;;191    			}
;;;192    			case 5:{
;;;193    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;194    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 6;
;;;195    			break;
;;;196    			}
;;;197    			case 6:{
;;;198    				calibrationFinish = app_findFire();
;;;199    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
000014  2614              MOVS     r6,#0x14
;;;200    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance + SRF_04_Data2.getDistance  < DISTANCE_TO_FIRE && calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){   /**与火焰的距离**/
;;;201    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 7;
;;;202    				}
;;;203    			break;
;;;204    			}
;;;205    			case 7:{			
;;;206    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;207    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 8;   
;;;208    				break;
;;;209    			}
;;;210    			case 8:{
;;;211    				app_fan();				//开风扇灭火
;;;212    				calibrationFinish = checkFire();
;;;213    				app_goOtherAction(400,NO_TURN,BEHIND);
;;;214    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;215    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_RIGHT_TURN_135;
;;;216    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 9;
;;;217    				}
;;;218    			break;
;;;219    			}
;;;220    			case 9:{//出屋子函数
;;;221    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;222    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 10;
;;;223    				break;
;;;224    			}
;;;225    			case 10:{
;;;226    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(LEFT);
;;;227    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;228    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;229    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 11;
;;;230    				}
;;;231    			break;
;;;232    			}
;;;233    			case 11:{
;;;234    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;235    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance > 25 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance > 25 && SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 35 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance <35){
;;;236    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 12;
;;;237    				}
;;;238    			break;
;;;239    			}
;;;240    			case 12:{
;;;241    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_RIGHT_90;
;;;242    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 13;
;;;243    			break;
;;;244    			}
;;;245    			case 13:{//出屋子函数
;;;246    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;247    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 14;
;;;248    				break;
;;;249    			}
;;;250    			case 14:{
;;;251    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(LEFT);
;;;252    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;253    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;254    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 15;
;;;255    				}
;;;256    			break;
;;;257    			}
;;;258    			case 15:{
;;;259    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
;;;260    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 17 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance < 17 ){
;;;261    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 16;
;;;262    				}
;;;263    			break;
;;;264    			}
;;;265    			case 16:{
;;;266    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_LEFT_TURN_90;
;;;267    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 17;
;;;268    			break;
;;;269    			}
;;;270    			case 17:{
;;;271    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;272    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 18;
;;;273    				break;
;;;274    			}
;;;275    			case 18:{
;;;276    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 19;
;;;277    			break;
;;;278    			}
;;;279    			case 19:{
;;;280    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;281    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;
000016  2363              MOVS     r3,#0x63
000018  78c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#3]            ;163
00001a  2f01              CMP      r7,#1                 ;162
00001c  d009              BEQ      |L2.50|
;;;282    			break;
;;;283    			}
;;;284    			//回到第一阶段位置
;;;285    			case 99:{
;;;286    				if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[NINTH_FIRE] == 1)
;;;287    					outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = RETURN;
;;;288    				else{
;;;289    					outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = THIRD_FIRE;
;;;290    				}			
;;;291    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;292    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;293    			break;
;;;294    			}
;;;295    		}
;;;296    	}
;;;297    	else {
;;;298    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){
00001e  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000020  d075              BEQ      |L2.270|
000022  dc75              BGT      |L2.272|
000024  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000026  d074              BEQ      |L2.274|
000028  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00002a  d100              BNE      |L2.46|
;;;299    			case 0:{
;;;300    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;	
;;;301    			break;
;;;302    			}
;;;303    			case 1:{
;;;304    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 2;
00002c  70e1              STRB     r1,[r4,#3]
                  |L2.46|
;;;305    			break;
;;;306    			}
;;;307    			case 2:{
;;;308    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;309    				if(SRF_04_Data3.getDistance > 40 && SRF_04_Data4.getDistance < 40){	
;;;310    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;311    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;312    				}
;;;313    			break;
;;;314    			}
;;;315    			case 3:{
;;;316    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;	
;;;317    			break;
;;;318    			}
;;;319    			case 99:
;;;320    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;321    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;322    				outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = THIRD_FIRE;
;;;323    			break;
;;;324    		}
;;;325    	}
;;;326    }

;;;537    void app_findSecondFire(void){

;;;544    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;545    				}
;;;546    				break;
;;;547    			}
;;;548    			case 'z':{
;;;549    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_RIGHT_TURN_90;
;;;550    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 'v';
;;;551    				break;
;;;552    			}
;;;553    			case 'v':{

;;;558    				}
;;;559    				break;
;;;560    			}
;;;561    			case 'M':{
;;;562    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;563    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 50 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance < 50){

;;;565    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'b';

;;;568    			}
;;;569    			case 'b':{
;;;570    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;571    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;
;;;572    			break;
;;;573    			}
;;;574    			case 1:{
;;;575    				calibrationFinish = app_findFire();
;;;576    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;

00004a  2e00              CMP      r6,#0
00004c  d102              BNE      |L3.84|
;;;578    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
00004e  7065              STRB     r5,[r4,#1]
;;;579    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 2;
000050  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000052  70e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#3]
                  |L3.84|
;;;580    				}
;;;581    			break;
;;;582    			}
;;;583    			case 2:{
;;;584    				app_fan();						
;;;585    				calibrationFinish = checkFire();			//开风扇
;;;586    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;587    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'a';
;;;588    				}
;;;589    				
;;;590    				break;
;;;591    			}
;;;592    			case 'a':{
;;;593    				app_goOtherAction(800,NO_TURN,BEHIND);
;;;594    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_LEFT_TURN_135;
;;;595    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;596    				break;
;;;597    			}
;;;598    			case 3:{
;;;599    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;600    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;
;;;601    			break;
;;;602    			}
;;;603    			case 99:
;;;604    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;605    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;606    				outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = RETURN;
;;;607    			break;
;;;608    			}
;;;609    	}
;;;610    }
000054  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
                  |L3.88|

                          AREA ||i.app_findThirdFire||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  app_findThirdFire PROC
;;;327    /***************三火点正在完善***************/
;;;328    void app_findThirdFire(void){
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;329    	if(outfireRobotState.fireArray[THIRD_FIRE] == 1){
000004  48b8              LDR      r0,|L4.744|
000006  4ab8              LDR      r2,|L4.744|
;;;330    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){
000008  2302              MOVS     r3,#2
00000a  7b04              LDRB     r4,[r0,#0xc]          ;329  ; outfireRobotState
;;;331    			case 0:{
;;;332    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
00000c  2115              MOVS     r1,#0x15
;;;333    				vTaskDelay(200);
;;;334    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 'a';
;;;335    			break;
;;;336    			}
;;;337    			case 'a':{
;;;338    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;339    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 32 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance < 32){
00000e  4eb7              LDR      r6,|L4.748|
000010  4fb7              LDR      r7,|L4.752|
;;;340    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;341    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;
;;;342    				}	
;;;343    			break;
;;;344    			}
;;;345    			case 1:{
;;;346    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_LEFT_90;
;;;347    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 2;
;;;348    			break;
;;;349    			}
;;;350    			case 2:{
;;;351    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;352    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;353    			break;
;;;354    			}
;;;355    			case 3:{
;;;356    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(RIGHT);
;;;357    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;358    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;359    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 4;
;;;360    				}
;;;361    			break;
;;;362    			}
;;;363    			case 4:{
;;;364    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
;;;365    				vTaskDelay(1000);
;;;366    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 5;
;;;367    			break;
;;;368    			}
;;;369    			case 5:{
;;;370    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;371    				if(SRF_04_Data5.getDistance > 40 && SRF_04_Data6.getDistance < 40){

;;;373    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 6;
;;;374    				}
;;;375    			break;
;;;376    			}
;;;377    			case 6:{
;;;378    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;379    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 7;
;;;380    			break;
;;;381    			}
;;;382    			case 7:{
;;;383    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
;;;384    				vTaskDelay(900);

;;;385    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 8;

;;;386    			break;
;;;387    			}

;;;389    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;390    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 35 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance < 35 ){

;;;392    				}
;;;393    			break;
;;;394    			}
;;;395    			case 9:{

;;;398    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance + SRF_04_Data2.getDistance  < DISTANCE_TO_FIRE && calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){   /**与火焰的距离**/

;;;400    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 10;
;;;401    				}
;;;402    			break;
;;;403    			}
;;;404    			case 10:{
;;;405    				app_fan();						
;;;406    				calibrationFinish = checkFire();			//开风扇
;;;407    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;408    					app_goOtherAction(600,LEFT,BEHIND);
;;;409    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 11;
;;;410    				}
;;;411    				
;;;412    			break;
;;;413    			}
;;;414    			case 11:{
;;;415    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(LEFT);
;;;416    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;417    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;418    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 12;
;;;419    				}
;;;420    			break;
;;;421    			}
;;;422    			case 12:{
;;;423    				app_goOtherAction(500,NO_TURN,BEHIND);
;;;424    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 13;
;;;425    			break;
;;;426    			}
;;;427    			case 13:{

;;;429    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;
;;;430    			}
;;;431    			case 99:
;;;432    				if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[THIRD_FIRE] == 1)
;;;433    					outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = RETURN;
;;;434    				else{

;;;438    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;

;;;440    			}
;;;441    		
;;;442    	}

;;;444    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){

                  |L4.744|

                          AREA ||i.app_outfireOneWorkDoing||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  app_outfireOneWorkDoing PROC
;;;952    /***寻火任务**/
;;;953    void app_outfireOneWorkDoing(void){
000000  480d              LDR      r0,|L5.56|
;;;954    	//加一个返回节点判断函数，一次判断终身享用
;;;955    	if(outfireRobotState.beginFlag == FREE && outfireRobotState.workMode != TEST){
000002  7981              LDRB     r1,[r0,#6]  ; outfireRobotState
000004  2901              CMP      r1,#1
000006  d116              BNE      |L5.54|
000008  7a01              LDRB     r1,[r0,#8]  ; outfireRobotState
00000a  2900              CMP      r1,#0
00000c  d013              BEQ      |L5.54|
;;;956    		switch(outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep){
00000e  79c0              LDRB     r0,[r0,#7]  ; outfireRobotState
000010  280a              CMP      r0,#0xa
000012  d210              BCS      |L5.54|
000014  e8dff000          TBB      [pc,r0]
000018  050b090f          DCB      0x05,0x0b,0x09,0x0f
00001c  0f0f0f0f          DCB      0x0f,0x0f,0x0f,0x0f
000020  070d              DCB      0x07,0x0d
;;;957    			case FIRST_FIRE:app_findFirstFire(); break;
000022  f7ffbffe          B.W      app_findFirstFire
;;;958    			case NINTH_FIRE:app_findNinthFire(); break;
000026  f7ffbffe          B.W      app_findNinthFire
;;;959    			case THIRD_FIRE:app_findThirdFire(); break;
00002a  f7ffbffe          B.W      app_findThirdFire
;;;960    			case SECOND_FIRE:app_findSecondFire(); break;
00002e  f7ffbffe          B.W      app_findSecondFire
;;;961    			case RETURN:app_returnFunc();break;
000032  f7ffbffe          B.W      app_returnFunc
                  |L5.54|
;;;962    		}
;;;963    	}
;;;964    }
000036  4770              BX       lr
;;;965    
                          ENDP

                  |L5.56|
                          DCD      outfireRobotState

                          AREA ||i.app_outfireOneWorkReady||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  app_outfireOneWorkReady PROC
;;;5      //  超声波与墙的距离 可以做  Flash
;;;6      void app_outfireOneWorkReady(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;7      { 
;;;8      	/*待补充*/ //用按键控制小车启动//
;;;9      	//finishFlag = SET_ZERO;
;;;10     	/***********初始化火点位置*********/
;;;11     	if(outfireRobotState.workMode == OUT_FIRE){
000002  4c0d              LDR      r4,|L6.56|
000004  7a20              LDRB     r0,[r4,#8]  ; outfireRobotState
000006  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000008  d10e              BNE      |L6.40|
;;;12     			app_judgeFunc();	
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       app_judgeFunc
;;;13     		if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[RETURN] == 0){
00000e  7f60              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0x1d]  ; outfireRobotState
000010  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
000012  2101              MOVS     r1,#1                 ;11
;;;14     			outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = FIRST_FIRE;
;;;15     			outfireRobotState.step = DOING;
000014  2302              MOVS     r3,#2
000016  b140              CBZ      r0,|L6.42|
;;;16     			outfireRobotState.workStep = NULL;
;;;17     			outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;18     			outfireRobotState.beginFlag = FREE;
;;;19     		}else if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[RETURN] ==	1){
000018  2801              CMP      r0,#1
00001a  d105              BNE      |L6.40|
;;;20     			outfireRobotState.robotTaskstep = RETURN;
00001c  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
00001e  71e0              STRB     r0,[r4,#7]
;;;21     			outfireRobotState.step = DOING;
000020  7163              STRB     r3,[r4,#5]
;;;22     			outfireRobotState.workStep = NULL;
000022  70e2              STRB     r2,[r4,#3]
;;;23     			outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
000024  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;24     				outfireRobotState.beginFlag = FREE;
000026  71a1              STRB     r1,[r4,#6]
                  |L6.40|
;;;25     		}
;;;26     	}
;;;27     }
000028  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L6.42|
00002a  71e2              STRB     r2,[r4,#7]            ;14
00002c  7163              STRB     r3,[r4,#5]            ;15
00002e  70e2              STRB     r2,[r4,#3]            ;16
000030  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]            ;17
000032  71a1              STRB     r1,[r4,#6]            ;18
000034  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;28     /***************一火点基本完备***************/
                          ENDP

000036  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L6.56|
                          DCD      outfireRobotState

                          AREA ||i.app_returnFunc||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  app_returnFunc PROC
;;;612    //节点返程函数
;;;613    void app_returnFunc(void){
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;614    	if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[FIRST_FIRE] == 1){
000004  4cfe              LDR      r4,|L7.1024|
000006  2601              MOVS     r6,#1
000008  4621              MOV      r1,r4
00000a  7d22              LDRB     r2,[r4,#0x14]  ; outfireRobotState
;;;615    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){
;;;616    			case 0:{
;;;617    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = REVERSE_LEFT_TURN_90;
;;;618    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;
;;;619    				break;
;;;620    			}
;;;621    			case 1:{
;;;622    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(LEFT);
00000c  f8df93f4          LDR      r9,|L7.1028|
;;;623    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
000010  2514              MOVS     r5,#0x14
;;;624    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;625    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 2;
;;;626    				}
;;;627    				break;
;;;628    			}
;;;629    			case 2:{
;;;630    				app_goOtherAction(800,NO_TURN,FRONT);
;;;631    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;632    				break;
;;;633    			}
;;;634    			case 3:{
;;;635    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;636    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;637    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 50 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance < 50)
000012  4ffd              LDR      r7,|L7.1032|
000014  f8df83f4          LDR      r8,|L7.1036|
000018  78c9              LDRB     r1,[r1,#3]            ;615
00001a  f04f0a03          MOV      r10,#3                ;630
00001e  f44f7048          MOV      r0,#0x320             ;630
000022  2a01              CMP      r2,#1                 ;614
000024  d01e              BEQ      |L7.100|
000026  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000028  4643              MOV      r3,r8
;;;638    				{
;;;639    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;640    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;
;;;641    				}
;;;642    				break;
;;;643    			}
;;;644    			/********最好加入原地校准******/
;;;645    			
;;;646    			case 99:{
;;;647    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;648    				outfireRobotState.step = FINISH;
;;;649    				break;
;;;650    			}
;;;651    		}
;;;652    	}else if(outfireRobotState.returnFlag[SECOND_FIRE] == 1){
00002a  f894e015          LDRB     lr,[r4,#0x15]  ; outfireRobotState
00002e  6892              LDR      r2,[r2,#8]            ;637
000030  689b              LDR      r3,[r3,#8]            ;637
000032  f04f0b04          MOV      r11,#4                ;615
;;;653    		switch(outfireRobotState.workStep){
;;;654    			case 0:{
;;;655    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;656    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 32 &&SRF_04_Data2.getDistance <32){
;;;657    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_LEFT_90;
;;;658    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'e';
;;;659    				}
;;;660    				break;
;;;661    			}
;;;662    			/********最好加入原地校准******/
;;;663    			case 'e':{
;;;664    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;665    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 1;
;;;666    				break;
;;;667    			}
;;;668    			case 1:{
;;;669    				calibrationGostraight(RIGHT);
;;;670    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;671    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 32 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance <32){
;;;672    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_LEFT_90;
;;;673    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'b';
;;;674    				}
;;;675    				break;
;;;676    			}
;;;677    			case 'b':{
;;;678    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = STOP;
;;;679    				vTaskDelay(200);
;;;680    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 'a';
;;;681    				break;
;;;682    			}
;;;683    			case 'a':{
;;;684    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(RIGHT);
;;;685    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;686    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 3;
;;;687    				}
;;;688    				break;
;;;689    			}
;;;690    			case 3:{
;;;691    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;

;;;692    				if(SRF_04_Data1.getDistance < 35 && SRF_04_Data2.getDistance<35){
;;;693    					outfireRobotState.moveWays = FRONT_TURN_LEFT_90;
;;;694    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'f';
;;;695    				}
;;;696    				break;
;;;697    			}
;;;698    			case 'f':{
;;;699    				calibrationFinish = app_calibration(RIGHT);
;;;700    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;
;;;701    				if(calibrationFinish == CALIBRATION_FINISHED){
;;;702    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 4;
;;;703    				}
;;;704    				break;
;;;705    			}
;;;706    			case 4:{
;;;707    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
;;;708    				vTaskDelay(800);
;;;709    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 5;
;;;710    				break;
;;;711    			}
;;;712    			case 5:{
;;;713    				calibrationGostraight(LEFT);
;;;714    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = OTHER;

;;;718    				}
;;;719    				break;
;;;720    			}
;;;721    			case 6:{

;;;723    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 'd';
;;;724    				break;
;;;725    			}
;;;726    			case 'd':{
;;;727    				outfireRobotState.moveWays = GO_STRAIGHT;
;;;728    				vTaskDelay(800);
;;;729    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 7;
;;;730    			break;
;;;731    			}

;;;738    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 8;
;;;739    				}

;;;747    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 'g';
;;;748    				}
;;;749    				break;

;;;757    				}

;;;766    					outfireRobotState.workStep = 99;
;;;767    				}
;;;768    				break;
;;;769    			}
;;;770    			case 99:{
;;;771    				outfireRobotState.workStep = 0;
;;;772    				outfireRobotState.step = FINISH;
;;;773    				break;
;;;774    			}
;;;775    		}
